Computer Networks from Scratch

Episode 171

FocusWriter

 https://gottcode.org/focuswriter/

FocusWriter is a simple, distraction-free writing environment. It utilizes a hide-away interface that you access by moving your mouse to the edges of the screen, allowing the program to have a familiar look and feel to it while still getting out of the way so that you can immerse yourself in your work. Itâ€™s available for Linux and Windows, and has been translated into many different languages.

Episode 171

Horcrux

 https://github.com/jesseduffield/horcrux

Split your file into encrypted fragments so that you don't need to remember a passcode

Episode 171

It takes a Mac to save a Mac

 https://support.apple.com/en-gb/guide/apple-configurator-mac/apdd5f3c75ad/mac

In very rare circumstances, such as a power failure during a macOS update or upgrade, a Mac may become unresponsive and so the firmware must be revived or restored.
